item.title: Error Adding Randomchest
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

case 10284: //Random Barrows if(playerHasItemAmount(605, 6)); { deleteItem(605, getItemSlot(605) 6); ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomBarrows(), 1); sendMessage("You unlock the six keyholes and recieve a random barrows item!"); } break;

here…we’re code marines not code samurai. We go kill a few innocents but we get the job done.

item.title: Error Adding Randomchest
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:9, topic:228187”] case 10284: //Random Barrows if(playerHasItemAmount(605, 6); { deleteItem(605, getItemSlot(605) 6); ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomBarrows(), 1); sendMessage("You unlock the six keyholes and recieve a random barrows item!"); } break;

you guys left out a 1, a comma, and a parentheses…[/quote]

            if(playerHasItemAmount(605, 6);

The compiler says that it expects a ‘)’ where the comma is, any idea why?

prima, gagea, your codes give out awfully a lot of errors

item.title: Error Adding Randomchest
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Okay so I added a randomchest code under my /* OBJECT CLICK ONE*/ area. Here is my code I used for my chest case 10284: //Random Barrows if(playerHasItemAmount(605, 6); { deleteItem(605, getItemSlot(605) 6); ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomBarrows(); sendMessage("You unlock the six keyholes and recieve a random barrows item!"); } break; Okay so yeah looks like its gona work but wait… NO! I get 3 errors when I compiler i get this

[code]Client.java:2645: ‘)’ expected
if(playerHasItemAmount(605, 6); {

client.java:2446: ‘)’ expected
deleteItem(605, getItemSlot(605) 6);

client.java:2647: ‘)’ expected
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomBarrows();
[/code]
Whats wrong here? It points to ; in the ifplayerhasitemAmount, the space in between (605) 6); and the ; in the last code

Read full topic
